title: The Blood Song of the Three Realms - Novel Updates
author: Blood Red   血红
description:
It is the Dharma-Ending Age and the Three Realms have reopened.

Ancient nobles lay hopelessly entangled between old debts of gratitude and past grievances.

Enemies fall.

Immortals and saints are slaughtered.

Hold your heads high and sing aloud as the legend of Yin Xuege pierces the Nine Heavens!>
